views.markdown:
This item is now Free.

Compatible with iOS 10

iOS 11 style lockscreen,

Brings music player and passcode view from iOS 11 to your iOS 10 device.

Music Player includes a compact mode where you can shrink the media controls down to allow for more lockscreen space.

Configure from settings.

This item is now Free. 1. Fixed licensing issues.
2. Other small fixes.
1. Fixed media player being dark for no reason.
2. Fixed text input passcode view having dark bar behind it.
3. Fixed effect when pressing passcode buttons.
4. Fixed sizing and text overlap on smaller devices.
5. Fixed misplaced volume slider.
6. Fixed notification cramping between media controls and notifications.
